website_summaries.verdict: The ever-iconic Chuck Taylor comes in earthy neutrals and vibrant colors that are perfect for spring through the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Seasonal High Top. Though its new colors give out a fresh perspective, it preserves the timeless look of the All-Star that many loved up to now.Still versatile, it is an easy choice of go-to kicks for the majority. Like the original silhouette, this particular edition does not have much cushioning and arch support. Despite this, however, it is still claimed by countless reviewers as a comfortable and reliable sneaker.
pros: The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Seasonal High Top has several colorways that several purchasers found pleasing to the eyes
A small number of reviewers applauded the sturdier canvas material of this high top
The stitching is also great according to them
Many loved the classic and stylish look of this Chuck
It goes with anything you wear, as highlighted by some users
A large number of purchasers dubbed this All Star high tops as their go-to shoes because of its overall performance
A couple of reviewers said that this shoe fits the same as any other Chucks they've owned
Several reviewers were pleased of its superb quality and comfort
Many reported that they had gotten lots of compliments anywhere they go because of this classic high top
The iconic look of this Converse shoe brought a sense of nostalgia to a few buyers
Some Converse fans commented that that the flat sole and the minimal construction of this shoe make it excellent performance footwear for weightlifting
cons: There were several reports on the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Seasonal High Top fitting a bit large
Some reviewers wished that this Seasonal All Star High Top iteration is available all-year round
Several users said they had to use inserts because of this shoe’s lack of arch support
The overall support of this shoe is minimal, which is a bit of an issue for a couple of reviewers
What a few reviewers disliked about some of the colorways of this shoe is that they get dirty quickly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service, great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic customer service, kept me updated with my order all the time! Great trainers fit great as ever l, definitely recommend buying from seller!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Arrived before due date 👍🏼 You go wrong with converse thankyou seller 👌🏽😁❤
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Love these converses as the logo is also in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these converses as the logo is also in a white leather that makes it different to your standard converses. The seller was prompt to ship item and they arrives in less than a week. Loses a star because there was some glue showing on the edges of the trainers but I think im just o.c.d
customer_reviews.author: Zahra Munshi

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Sizing!
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that these are sized wrong or misleadingly in the listing. I ordered an EU 37 which I believed to be a UK womens size 4. They arrived and were a women's 6.5. However the condition of the boots was great as they were brand new in their box and I got a full refund immediately when I returned them so was happy with the returns service but disappointed that the sizing was not explained very well in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: rebeccap1

customer_reviews.title: impressed
customer_reviews.text: The eyelets were not white as they are pictured, however the shoes are good quality and are at a great price. The delivery speed was amazing considering the distance they had to travel from and the price paid for postage, they came in less than 2 days after dispatch.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Good price, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Good price, excellent quality, my son is a 10.5.and he cannot find these trainers in half sizes . Thank you Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the product doesn’t fit so I am returning them

product_meta.title: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Seasonal Hi-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Chuck taylor all star seasonal forehead in white with white soles, laces and white logo. The surface of these converse sneaker is made of solid fabric. Skate sneakers with reinforced heel and toe, soft insole, ventilation holes and a flexible rubber outsole with non-slip pattern, ideal on a skateboard. On the inside is a rubber patch with the logo and name brand converse all star.
feature_bullets: Fit Type: Fits Half A Size Larger
